DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe single dose pharmacokinetics total radioactivity plasma whole blood follow PO administration [ 14C ] TR-701 healthy adult male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Absorption , Metabolism , And Excretion Of Orally Administered 14C TR 701 In Healthy Adult Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , single-dose study absorption , metabolism , excretion 200 mg [ 14C ] -TR-701 ( approximately 100 μCi ) administer orally follow least 8-hour fast . Subjects receive single dose 200 mg [ 14C ] TR 701 ( approximately 100 μCi ) administer oral solution . The dose administer follow least 8-hour fast follow 4-hour fast food , include water .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males , 18 50 year age , inclusive . 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 20 kg/m2 29.9 kg/m2 , inclusive . 3 . In good health , determine clinically significant finding medical history , physical examination ( Checkin ) , 12lead ECG , vital sign . 1 . Significant history clinical manifestation significant metabolic , allergic , dermatological , hepatic , renal , hematological , pulmonary , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , neurological , psychiatric disorder ( determined Investigator Sponsor ) . 2 . History abnormal ECG clinically significant opinion Investigator . 3 . History hypersensitivity , intolerance , allergy antibiotic oxazolidinone class , ingredient formulation .
